metadata.Description: Policies and programs designed to support individuals and communities in times of economic and social vulnerability.

social protection.Description: Social protection implements various government programs that provide financial assistance and support to vulnerable individuals and families.
Social protection funds social welfare organizations that work towards improving the well-being and livelihoods of disadvantaged groups.
Social protection focuses on poverty reduction by implementing policies and programs that aim to alleviate poverty and improve living conditions.
Social protection is included in national development plans as a key component for achieving inclusive and sustainable development.
Social protection partners with non-governmental organizations to enhance the delivery and effectiveness of social welfare programs.
Social protection contributes to social cohesion by reducing inequality, promoting social justice, and ensuring equal opportunities for all.
Social protection monitors the implementation of social welfare programs to ensure their effectiveness and impact on the target beneficiaries.
Social protection targets vulnerable populations such as the elderly, disabled individuals, and low-income households for providing necessary support and assistance.
